patthana9.15:1.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanadassanena pahātabbaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana9.15:2.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana9.15:3.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana9.15:21.1_2: Naaraṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo ca naaraṇo nakusalo ca dhammā
patthana9.15:22.1: Nasaraṇaṁ nakusalañca naaraṇaṁ nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
